meta.ogDescription: Case study focused on framing, drywall, crew support, and final skylight detailing for a high-end living room renovation.

hero.title: Custom Living Room – Framing, Drywall & Skylight Feature
hero.subtitle: From framing and drywall to finish-ready detailing, this project delivered a custom curved ceiling with skylight integration and LED cove effect.

role.label: My Scope
role.value: Framing, drywall, taping, team support, material management, daily reporting

executiveSummary.title: Executive Summary
executiveSummary.body: This living room renovation required precise execution of a custom curved ceiling integrated with a skylight feature. The project combined structural framing support, drywall installation, finish preparation, and active crew coordination to maintain quality standards and construction momentum.

projectObjectives.title: Project Objectives
items: Support construction of a curved architectural ceiling around the skylight opening
Deliver clean drywall installation and finish-ready surfaces
Coordinate daily crew tasks to keep work aligned with schedule
Maintain material flow and site readiness throughout all phases

scopeOfWork.title: Scope of Work
items: Framing support for curved ceiling geometry and skylight detailing
Drywall installation for walls and ceiling zones
Taping, mudding, sanding, and finish preparation
Assistance with team alignment and day-to-day sequencing
Material tracking, staging, and daily progress reporting

technicalExecution.title: Technical Execution & Methodology
technicalExecution.body: Execution followed a phased workflow: framing verification, drywall boarding, joint treatment, and progressive finishing. Scaffold-supported access enabled safe and accurate work on elevated ceiling transitions. Continuous trade coordination helped resolve constraints quickly and preserved installation quality.

resultsValueDelivered.title: Results & Value Delivered
resultsValueDelivered.body: The final result delivered a refined living room feature with smooth curves, integrated skylight detailing, and balanced LED cove lighting. The process improved site efficiency through organized material handling and clear reporting, while ensuring a high-end visual outcome consistent with client expectations.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.body: This project demonstrates the value of disciplined execution in custom interior renovation. By combining technical precision, team collaboration, and daily operational control, the build progressed from rough framing to a polished final environment with strong architectural impact.
